titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.
Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-75, by Mrs. Myrick.

The requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII for a two-thirds vote to consider a report from the Committee on Rules on the same day it is presented to the House is waived with respect to any resolution reported on the legislative day of April 12, 2003, providing for consideration or disposition of a conference report to accompany H.R. 1559.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 26.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the House on April 11, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Waives a requirement of rule XIII to provide for consideration of the conference report to accompany H.R. 1559 (making emergency war-time supplemental appropriations for FY 2003).
